overview:
Derick Naef is the co-founder and Chief Technology Officer for GroupLogic. In this role he is responsible for the product vision and technology innovation efforts of the company, as well as managing product development. Naef has over 20 years of experience leading teams building commercial software solutions targeted across a wide range of industries and platforms.

Previously, Naef served as the Chief Operating Officer at GroupLogic for 4 years, where he helped lead GroupLogic to record growth and recognition as a trusted provider of solutions for integrating the Mac into the Enterprise and moving mission critical data around the Enterprise.
